ext:property.name: localContextRecordID
ext:property.dc:description: The identifier of the occurrence the measurement or fact refers to. If not applicable, it should be left empty.

ext:property.name: occurrenceID
ext:property.dc:description: The identifier of the occurrence the measurement or fact refers to. If not applicable, it should be left empty.

ext:property.name: localContextDateAdded
ext:property.dc:description: The date on which the occurrence or event was added to the Project. Recommended best practice is to use an encoding scheme, such as ISO 8601:2004(E).

ext:property.name: localContextDateModified
ext:property.dc:description: The date on which the Local Context Project was last modified. Recommended best practice is to use an encoding scheme, such as ISO 8601:2004(E).

ext:property.name: localContextProjectDateAdded
ext:property.dc:description: The date on which the Local Context Project was added. Recommended best practice is to use an encoding scheme, such as ISO 8601:2004(E).

ext:property.name: localContextProvidersID
ext:property.dc:description: A unique identifier for a project assigned by project creator. Included to assist cross-linking and searching.

ext:property.name: localContextProjectPage
ext:property.dc:description: The url to view the Local Context Project page.

ext:property.name: localContextBCLabels
ext:property.dc:description: The type values for the Biocultural Labels that have been applied by the project. This should be provided as a | delimited string.

ext:property.name: localContextTKLabels
ext:property.dc:description: The name of the Traditional Knowledge Labels that have been applied by the project. This should be provided as a | delimited string.

ext:property.name: localContextNotices
ext:property.dc:description: The name of Notices that have been applied by the project. This should be provided as a | delimited string.

ext:property.name: localContextBCLabelsID
ext:property.dc:description: A list of the unique Local Context UUID assigned to each label listed in BClabels. This should be provided as a | delimited string.

ext:property.name: localContextTKLabelsID
ext:property.dc:description: A list of the unique Local Context UUID assigned to each label listed in TKLabels. This should be provided as a | delimited string.

ext:property.name: localContextNoticesID
ext:property.dc:description: A list of the unique Local Context UUID assigned to each Notice listed in localContextNotices. This should be provided as a | delimited string.
